text: Luis Adolfo Galván (24 February 1948 – 5 May 2025) was an Argentine footballer. He played as a centre back. He played for Argentina national football team from 1975 until 1983. He played for the national team when they won the 1978 FIFA World Cup. Galván died on 5 May 2025 from problems caused by pneumonia in Córdoba, Argentina at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Argentine footballers
